ENTRY.refkeywords: get_xsxsect xspecabund xspec xsect cross-section bcmc obcm vern

DESC.PARA: The set_xsxsect command sets the photoelectric cross-section used in XSpec absorption models. The get_xsxsect command returns the current setting.

ROW.DATA: bcmc with the old He cross-section

DESC.PARA: This information is taken from the XSpec User's Guide. Version 12.7.1 of the XSpec models is supplied with CIAO 4.4.1.

SYNTAX.LINE: Cross Section Table set to vern: Verner, Ferland, Korista, and Yakovlev 1996

DESC.PARA: The current cross-section setting is retrieved ("bcmc", the default). It is then changed to "vern".

BUGS.PARA: For a list of known bugs and issues with the XSPEC models, please visit the XSPEC bugs page.
